website_summaries.verdict: Not only do these drops come at a steal, but they act as an all-in-one cure for a host of eye-related issues.
pros: These not only get rid of eye redness, but they also prevent and stop itching, and to lubricate eyes
Top conveniently snaps shut to ensure no leaks
Has a cooling effect that brings further relief
cons: These may sting slightly for a few seconds right after use

customer_reviews.title: Why did I use this?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what enticed me to even try this product. The product does exactly what is says by "cooling" your eyes. However, I would describe it more like a prolonged burning sensation that I regretted immediately. It is literally putting liquid menthol in your eyes. I'd be curious to correspond with anyone who actually enjoys putting liquid menthol in their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Orrell

customer_reviews.title: These things are the bomb...
customer_reviews.text: These things are the bomb. You have to get used to them, as you have to get used to the slight sting.(It's not bad at all) But these aren't water drops like Visene, They are almost like a glycerin, as they cover you eyes with a nice thick layer of a thin gel like substance, and make you dry eyes feel like normal and even better.SO redness and dryness is gone in seconds. Glad my friend turned me into them. Def worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Possibly received fake product
customer_reviews.text: This product does not provide the same relief as the Rohto eye drops purchased at my local store. I don't experience the cooling sensation when I apply them. My eyes remain red after use. I have had a problem where I wake up with deeply bloodshot eyes if I wear my contacts. These eye drops have done nothing to resolve that; the same brand and type of eye drops from my local store clear my eyes up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: You won't believe your EYES!
customer_reviews.text: It's like a cool breeze and your favorite mint...for your eyes! VERY hydrating with just one drop per eye! I wear contacts and wether they are in or out, these drops are pure magic. I really like the bottle and snap/click cap. very secure and portable. Careful, don't lose it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best for soothing and cooling hot, itchy red eyes. Terrible cap that wastes product.
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from itchy allergy eyes or red tired eyes these are the best drops, much better than any other brand. They do a great job at lubricating and cooling. Despite some reviews to the contrary, I was not compensated to hype this product, I discovered it on my own and have switched over from other brands like Clear Eyes and Visine. Those brands do not reduces redness or cool as much, Rohto feels like it lubricates much better as well. There is one reason for 4 stars. That cap is slippery and so hard to pop off that it causes several drops to squirt out because you're squeezing so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Raton

customer_reviews.title: Great drops!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Great for eyes that have a lot of heat. There's a slight sting initially but quickly becomes refreshing. My eyes get very white and bright. Also love the container design. It's sleek and locks to prevent inadvertently opening up.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops I've ever used, I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best eye drops I've ever used. Rohto makes 3 types of eye drops (to my knowledge). I've tried all 3 and they are all awesome. It's always refreshing to put these in my eyes, they clean and lubricate the eye and it just always feels better afterwards. Once you go Rohtu, you'll never go back to the 'other' eye drops!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great to moisten eyes
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get cooling eye drops that apparently I missed the fact that the cooling sensation is from menthol. Ouch. I don’t like the slight burn it causes. But to each his own. Even though I don’t prefer the cooling sensation I would still recommend this product to those unlike me. My boyfriend loves these eye drops. So I gave him the other two boxes I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of red eyes every time
customer_reviews.text: Be it when allergy season comes around or you just took a blunt to the dome, these drops will clear your eyes in a couple min, redness gone. Some people say the drops sting a little when you put them in st first but after a couple times you barely even notice it and actually come to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops I've used
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes, this is good stuff. I often have irritated eyes after getting out of the shower, or, after using a PC for hours, and typically used Visine or Clear Eyes as necessary. But both provide only very temporary relief. These drops feel thicker, and feel much more soothing and last longer than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mohr

customer_reviews.title: wow these are amazing! When you first put them in they feel ...
customer_reviews.text: wow these are amazing! When you first put them in they feel weird like you put icy hot in your eye.... But that subsides pretty fast and it leaves your eyes clear and not itching! I like to use these to clear the red and then I use blue drops to really make my eyes sparkle! <3
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Life changing, never again will I be nervous about people knowing that I'm high in public.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, these will burn your eyes for 5-30 minutes, they work okay, but clear eyes are just as good, cheaper, and don't hurt so bad...
customer_reviews.author: matt g.

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Drops (IMO)
customer_reviews.text: Rohto eye drops have a unique cooling sensation that lasts the first minute, or so. I find this very soothing. Rohto eye drops also perform as advertised. They vary effectively remove redness. The moisturizing drops comfortably linger, adding moisture without any impact on vision. I highly recommend Rohto eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: SW Beth

customer_reviews.title: Cool like Peppermint
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive eyes, this product may not be for you. It does have a cool peppermint feel to it. Love the cool refreshing feel and how it just wakes your eyes up. Disappointed that it doesn't get the red out like Lumify does for me, was hoping to switch products due to the price. Will keep as my back up, though.
customer_reviews.author: SoCali

customer_reviews.title: The Devil's Eyes No More
customer_reviews.text: Cooling and soothing for dry / irritated / red eyes. One drop in each eye in the morning and maybe again later in the day and my eyes feel great. Amazing how your body can feel tired if your eyes feel tired, yet can feel more energetic when they're lubricated.

customer_reviews.title: May be fine for non-contact wearers
customer_reviews.text: Only until I purchased this product is there any mention that it can not be used with contact lenses. Considering a large number of people wear lenses and would use during the day, it's not any help. My eyes tend to get red very easily. I put drops in one eye after I took my lenses out before bed. In the morning, that eye was definitely redder than the eye I didn't put drops in. I will be giving them away to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia G

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I like the cooling feeling, but I have really bad pollen allergies and feel like my Bauch and Lomb OpCon A work a lot better at relieving itching and redness. My eyes did get white pretty fast though with this, that was pretty amazing :)
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: The only eye brand I use
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell a difference between the regular and the max strength, but both clear out the red in my eyes with a refreshing cooling feeling. Doesn’t burn as it cools, just a refreshing feeling when you put them in your eyes. Works well to soothe tired eyes. Other less potent brands do not have the cooling or staying power that the Ortho brand does.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: 100 wasps!
customer_reviews.text: Dude. These drops keep the red at bay but they sting like a hundred wasps. If you’re going to use makeup, definitely put them in 10 min before so your eyes can finish watering before you even start!!
customer_reviews.author: MizGee

customer_reviews.title: Burns like hell
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel like it could be good for your eyes. Only giving it 2 stars because once the moment you thought you were going to loose your eyesight forever is over, it does get rid of the redness.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I keep my own stock and now have a few relatives using them as well. The menthol is soothing to the eyes and clears the redness right up. I love the design of the cap—easy to remove but secure enough to toss in your bag with worry of an accidental spill.
customer_reviews.author: F. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Rohto eye drops
customer_reviews.text: Had to ask my daughter how to remove the lid, but once opened ( push down on the lip and turn to open) I liked how bright my eyes were. This has a little bit but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Allergies or Irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have insane allergies as I'm allergic to animals, but I work in a Grooming salon. Great for red eyes and dry contacts!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaM

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops ever
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops are wonderful. I’ve always had very dry eyes and these drops work very well. The newer lids are a little hard to open but they are worth the trouble
customer_reviews.author: Jim Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Eye caffeine!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye drops. I use them every morning; it's like a cup of coffee for my eyes! Helps wake my tired eyes up. I have been using them for years.
customer_reviews.author: staggsjd

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I have tried SO MANY eyedrops, but I feel that I always have to keep putting them in every hour. However, with the Rohto, I get instant relief and the minty feeling is very refreshing. I love the package design and the amount in it. Love it will buy again considering I spend long hours on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Xin Wang

customer_reviews.title: Won’t go back to any other eye drop
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!!! I smoke often and these work every time to help my dry, red, itchy eyes. They work when my allergies are bad too. I LOVE the cooling feeling of them, won’t go back to any other eye drop.
customer_reviews.author: Frostbite

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for redness relief. Cooling effect a new sensation but it’s fine. Reviews stating the “horrible” sting/burning sensation exaggerated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool burn
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby but he can’t use them because of high eye pressure. I like them, kind of feels like a cool burning but in a good way. Like when you breathe in quickly after a Vick’s cough drop! Refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Veneris

customer_reviews.title: So glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The drops feel great, I could see the difference right away. I'm old and it cleared my eyes up, I could see better; crazy maybe, but it works
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reid

customer_reviews.title: Your eyes will thank you
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from insomnia and the medications for that condition can leave my eyes bloodshot and extremely dry. These have been the best eye drops that I have ever used. Would definitely recommend and will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: April Wallace

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: I've never had eye drops as good as this. Other brands work. But, some brands leak. Their packaging is perfect and lasts. I have dry eyes and these are about perfect for me in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cotton

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT IT, TRIED IT, NOW THEY ARE MY GO TO!
customer_reviews.text: I WAS LIKE WHAT!? THEN I WAS LIKE WOW! AND NOW I AM LIKE THESE ARE THE ONLY ONES I BUY! I HAD BOUGHT THEM YEARS AGO AND THEY DID NOT HAVE THIS PUSH DOWN LOCK THEY HAVE NOW, I DISLIKE THAT IT SNAPS SO LOUD, ITS JUST KINDA AN ATTENTION DRAWER. BUT TWO THUMBS UP FOR SURE.
customer_reviews.author: Naggin

customer_reviews.title: Only need 2-3 applications a day
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the longest lasting red-eye relief I've experienced from eye drops. I love the "flavor" so you know when you hit the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Drew63

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: WOWZERS- This really works to relieve dry and red eyes. I noticed the cooling effects immediately and will definitely repurchase to keep one in my handbag during high pollen days.
customer_reviews.author: L. Li

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: The product burns slightly upon application. Nonetheless, I used it for 2 weeks hopeful that it would minimize irritation and redness despite the application sensation. My eyes appear to be worse because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb. I keep it in the fridge and it makes your eyes feel great. It does sting a little but personally I like a little burn.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I heard that this product helps one’S eye to be super white. I don’t find that to be the case for me. Also, I don’t like the “stinging” feeling it has when I put it in my eyes. My eyes get super red which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SGP

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Wanted my eyes to look very bright after use, however that’s not quite the case. They do soothe them after use though, more so than standard eye drops and they aren’t expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops and I have tried all of them Last longer also very thick not watery Great dispenser
customer_reviews.author: antonio c.

customer_reviews.title: 👁👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: My second time buying this three pack! I have always been an eye drop (and chapstick) daily user and these are my all time favorite. They aren’t too thin to not fully moisturizer however not too thick to get that goopy foggy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great eye-saver
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years, will clear up anything from stoner eyes to general strain.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried many eye drops in the past. These ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many eye drops in the past. These eye drops actually work fast. I suffer everyday with dry burning itchy eyes as well as being Red all the time. I will never use any other eye drop.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Whittier

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these eye drops — they feel great in the morning and wake you up really well. They get rid of any redness from a sleepless night / crying / allergies!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Clears red eyes and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye drops- These really help with clearing red eyes and leave my eyes feeling refreshed
customer_reviews.author: Lilrugey

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops on the market. They cool without burning
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Drops Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many brands and variations of eye drops, but these are the strongest eye drops out there. They sting a bit for people who haven’t used them before but I don’t even notice it anymore. The bottle functions well and looks really cool compared to other eye drops. Even the packaging was better than other eye drops. They are the only eye drops that will clear red eyes consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Justus Sneary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect, clears my eyes up to pearl white in minutes, it is painful for around 30 seconds then it’s fine. Great product, I loved that it came in a three pack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this watered down version
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Have to use 20+ drops per eye in order for it to work as advertised. The cooling feels more like burning.
customer_reviews.author: Life Portrayed as INTJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops I’ve ever used! They’re difficult to find in stores and this is a good price—order them now!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product, I suffer chronic dry eye & have tried EVERYTHING to help. This really works!

customer_reviews.title: Not helping, not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product not helping with my eye redness. It’s a cheap one but there is no value on it. Not recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Otgon2

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Red Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: These drops are awesome they help with my allergies and keep my eyes clear. I used the subscribe and save and they tend to save me money and I don't run out of eye drops I would highly recommend these drops if you have red eye issues from allergies or you know other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very little improvement in redness
customer_reviews.text: Soothing for about 30 minutes. Does not improve redness. Going back to my pricey drops that actually work
customer_reviews.author: AmyK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product with great quality. It cools my eyes when use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Drops for Tired Allergy Eyes
customer_reviews.text: ROHTO cool are my favorite eye drops of all time. Long lasting hydration with a pleasant cooling effect. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Pairs well with weed
customer_reviews.text: If your eyes are dry for whatever reason, these are like a cold soothing waterfall for your eyeballs. HIGHLY RECOMMEND. They also have a pretty intense burn so be ready for that.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops
customer_reviews.text: Best of the best in eye drops. One drop in the am lasts all day. Feels great and does not blur your vision like others do. Highly recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Reg Labbe

customer_reviews.title: Love love love....
customer_reviews.text: It's AMAZING! The initial menthol sting is there but clears up almost immediately. Eyes feel refreshed. Love love love...

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than walgreens
customer_reviews.text: I use these a lot. I buy them for almost 7 bucks each at Walgreens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product. Don't buy it if you're sensitive or squeamish around your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: The "burning" sensation (others refer to it as a "cooling" sensation) is what makes these drops worthwhile for me. They feel truly refreshing, and my eyes are brighter & clearer than I've ever seen. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops on the market So cooling to the eyes with no sting

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who loves this product. He says it’s very soothing to his eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Drops help a bit with my dry eyes and seems to whiten them too

customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops, gets rid of red eyes within seconds. Burns a bit, but well worth it.

customer_reviews.title: The drops are very effective - the cap is terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and for long

customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every eye drop around but these seem to work the best. I love that it comes in a 3 pack because it is very convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Great redness relief
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this product, it was a little strong. After the third or fourth time, I got used to it. Redness relief in a minute, in my case.

customer_reviews.title: Great redness relief and good moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: These drops work really well, with great redness relief and good moisturizing. I found that putting the drops in your pocket for a bit before use dramatically reduces the sting when the drops go in. Only takes one drop in each eye and I'm good to go.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Rohto Cool Max Maximum Redness Relief Cooling Eye Drops, 0.4 Ounce, 3 Count
product_meta.description: Style:Redness Relief, Max StrengthRohto Cooling Eye Drops with Fresh kick technology deliver an intense freshness that soothes and comforts eyes for up to 8 hours. Rohto Cool Max brings instant cooling comfort and maximum redness relief to irritated eyes due to late nights, eye strain, overuse of digital devices, environmental conditions, pollen, dust, and inadequate tear production. All Rohto eye drops come in a unique clear bottle with a one of a kind single drop dispenser. Rohto redness relief eye drops are now packaged with a child-resistant, senior friendly closure as required by the Consumer Products Safety Commission. Rohto Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. has been producing and marketing eye drops for over 100 years. Rohto is the #1 global OTC eye care brand and has been the #1 brand in Japan for the past 40 years. Source: Euro monitor International Limited; Consumer Health Eye Care definition, retail value share, 2016 data
feature_bullets: From the # 1 global OTC eye care brand
Provides the maximum level of redness relief to whiten red, irritated eyes
Relieves dryness of the eye and helps protect against further irritation
Fast-acting formula with Fresh kick technology brings instant cooling relief to your eyes
Soothes and comforts eyes for up to 8 hours. Do not store above 25°C

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
